description: Baron Von Drake was cast out many years ago due to rumors of meddling in necromancy. Although his appears remains unchanged, he has become possessed with some powerful demonic force, incinerating anything in his path.
The Golden Cockatrice is an extremely rare find, but folklore has it that some of the finest armor can be crafted from its feathers.

The Cursed Samurai is a decendant of the eithteen incarnation of the one known as 'Death'. The curse was placed on him in ages past and has since corrupted his soul, turning him into a living nightmare.

Baron Von Drake was cast out many years ago due to rumors of meddling in necromancy. Although his appears remains unchanged, he has become possessed with some powerful demonic force, incinerating anything in his path.
The Golden Cockatrice is an extremely rare find, but folklore has it that some of the finest armor can be crafted from its feathers.

The Cursed Samurai is a decendant of the eithteen incarnation of the one known as 'Death'. The curse was placed on him in ages past and has since corrupted his soul, turning him into a living nightmare.

Steep Nojor is one of the troubled offspring of the legendary horse Sleipner. Steep Nojor has been plagued by an inner demon for many years and has no good left within him. He wants only to cause destruction and pain to all about him.

Malphas the Destroyer is a mighty being of fire and burning iron. It is said that in the time of legends that Malphas had many legions of demons under his command and at one point even tried to take over the world. He failed in his conquest and was banished. However he has returned from the abyss once again and must be stopped before he can raise another army of demonic creatures.

A huge earthquake has opended up a  fiery pit from which the giant demon known in legend as Triclopse has used to re enter the world exactly 600 years after first being banished. Triclopse must be sent back to whence it came before the demon can cause destruction upon the mortal world.
Xinderoth, tyrant, deceiver of Demons, destroyer of cities. Ageless and powerful. He is not to be taken lightly.

The Darkwater Hag has walked the realms for countless ages. Her spite concentrating with every passing season making her a powerful and insidious opponent. Lishka has a habit of using her enemies as playthings in her plans, which she carefully orchestrates then watches those she involves destroy themselves at her whim.

The Vexus Wasps are evil creatures with a noxious poison sting. The Vexus Queen has an intelligence that makes the combat with this creature much more deadly. She does have a maternal instinct for her subjects and will attack any intruder who injures any of her Children.

Throthnir the Rune Smith was mad and shunned, even by his own people. Locked in prison he secretly started work upon a great rune of unbelievable power. On the last hammer blow the rune activated and the power emanated from it, destroying the Dwarf hold and left Throthnir disfigured. Throthnir has now escaped, intent on causing havoc on the world with the power he created.

The being known to the outside world as Azehma the Dwarf once had more humble beginnings in ages past but was corrupted and possessed by a great fiery demonic entity. How Azehma befell this curse is now lost in time however he was locked in a magical prison in the deepest of dungeons of a great Dwarf hold. Tragedy befell this hold one night and Azehma was released upon the world once again to cause death and destruction.

Lorelei the Consumer was once a Succubus of reasonable power. She saw herself as a foul demon and so pleaded with the Goddess of Magic, Lindarsil, to be made human. The Gods rarely give away such gifts for free so she set Lorelei a test. If she completed the test, she'd become Human. If she failed she would become something......else. The test itself is lost in the mists of time but the result is not. Lorelei failed her test and her demonic frame was warped and twisted into the powerful, evil form of a Lamia. This shattered her mind and she now rampages through the worlds Forests with a Lamias vile hunger for the flesh of the young and innocent.

Pinoldar the Centaur is one of the greatest of the Centaur warriors of the tribe of Naean. He is a great warrior whos hatred for evil has lead him on a search for other like minded warriors. He encourages those he finds to fight him, for those who win against his great skill he will deem them powerful enough to continue on their way as worthy warriors against the dark.

Lusika is from the deepest depths of sea. The creature resembles a jellyfish but only many times larger and able to walk on land. It is said to be more intelligent than the oldest Elves and indeed its rampage over dry land seems to have a pattern and specific targets, giving rise to stories that Lusika is a tool of the water Gods, sent on some unknown mission of revenge on the people of the surface...

Count Gorbalz was once but a story about a foul Vampire that had iron teeth and claws and that ate children who were naughty. However some stories can take on a life of their own. No one knows how but Gorbalz became very real. Some say a real Vampire took on the guise of the Count, others think that fear of the Count magically took shape and now haunts the night. Whatever the real reason is is unknown what is known is that Gorbalz is a very real and hungry threat...

Alicanto the Azurewing is mystical creature that is said to feast upon the flesh of the weak and vain among mankind. The bird is covered with feathers that are extremely hard and durable like Dwarf metal, though light and flexable. The feathers appear as an iridescient blue, earning the creature the name Azurewing.

Fushiyoma, a guardian of the Underworld stalks the realms searching for an unknown treasure. She rarely speaks, and when she does it is to pronounce a doom or a curse upon the unfortunate that has drawn her attention. Her three attendants are constantly roaming the lands on their unknown quest. Many times they have been destroyed, but they always return to their Mistresses side to continue her bidding.

The Dreadlord is a necromantic being who's power over the Undead is so vast, it breaks the very laws of magic as many understand them. None know the origins of the Dreadlord but many legends tell of his past aggressions against the living. The Shadow Lord is an ally of the Dreadlord, for even the Shadow Lord knows not to try and subdue the Dreadlord to his will and that allegiance is better for both. The Dreadlord wishes to rule the world and shape it into his own personal view and overthrow the very gods themselves...

The Yokai are an dangerous class of demons that formed a huge army allied to the Shadowlord in the past. Amakiri is one of the most powerful of its kind and was imprisoned in a dimension by Elvish magic wards. These wards have been failing slowly over the centuries and Amakiri has broken through into the mortal realm. Once again he is free to sow destruction and terror...

Deep within ancient dark forests the evil tree spirit known as Night Branch Slept. This ancient entity's real name has long been lost in time but what has always been known is Night Branches hatred for others. The Spirit slept deeply for an age until it was recently roused by an unknowing loggers axe, none saw the logger again. Now roused, Night Branch once again poses a threat to the world...

The embodiment of the Orcs racial lust of battle and blood, Luz Tagoz manifests as a titanic Avatar for war, wreathed in raging, blood red fire. The monstrous being storms towards the battlelines of his races foes, swatting lesser warriors aside with one of the four huge weapons gripped in his mighty fists.

Rumor has it this demon was summoned by a warlocks apprentice who naively read aloud a snippet from one of his masters most powerful flesh bound tomes. The creature lashed out at the inexperienced mage and tore his skull from his body and immediately fled to the mountains. It has been spotted collecting all kinds of different skulls and obsessing over them, caressing various patterns into them with its sharp claws. Some think it's keeping them as trophies, others believe it's for a ritual to get back home.

Empusa lurks around long stretches of road with tiring travelers. She follows her victims disguised as innocent creatures, waiting for her prey to settle for the night. She reveals her true identity only to those that she chooses to devour. Her only weakness is her heart, which is only exposed briefly when she is absorbing the essence from her dinner.

droppedItems.itemName: Recipe of Empusa Heart Blood Gloves
Recipe of Empusa Heart Blood Helm

description: Something has changed. Is it in the air? The Magical powers that bathe the lands? Whatever it is, it has roused Feilong from it's slumber. With a joyous bellow, the noble Feilong launches itself into the air and seeks out Warriors to duel, looking for those worthy to receive a Jade Scale and the fortune that comes with it!

The simple minded but destructive giant known as Thoon blunders his way through the lands finding food or Shiny shields or armor that he collects and hangs about his massive body. He calls his collectables his "purtys" and it is said includes many rare items once owned by valiant warriors. The Zorgrom legion hired Thoon in several battles but were unable to tie him to the legion for long as he gets bored easily and will wander away or get distracted by glinting objects.

Shroud Weaver is another of the Shadow Lords Emissaries and, like Burzzthak, specialises in Corruption of the Mind. Unlike Burzzthak, who targets the mightiest of individuals, Weaver targets the Communities. He hides and plants the seeds of despair and hatred near villages and towns, corrupting the people of the Realms, the people that the Light worshipping fools of the Cathedral so desperately wish to save. If there is a village that is tearing itself apart through hate and paranoia, if they are seeing foes who are not there, Shroud Weaver is likely the cause.

The Shroud Jabberwock is a fell creature that could only have been created by a fevered dream. It has long been suspected to be a monstrous creation of the Shadow Lord and it's recent appearances in His dark armies seems to give this theory credence. The beast seems to sow madness in it's wake, reducing even the strongest of willed to babbling, manic lunatics. It is whispered darkly that the Jabberwock can enter dreams and corrupt the dreamer, twisting their mind as it sees fit, usually creating another follower for it's Dark Master!

spawningInfo.realmName: Floating Islands of Wu Kong (East Island)

description: The Flesh Weaver rests in it's horrific majesty. An undulating boiling mass of viscous flesh that seems to be undergoing a contestant process of creation and renewal. Eyes, mouths and grasping tentacles constantly erupt on the surface of this revolting entity, that defies the base laws nature. It's role in the Court of the Old Ones is to reshape the flesh of the living into the perfection it should always have been.

The keeper of the deepest mysteries and ancient knowledge, the Silent Holder rests in the void between eternity and possibility. It enlightens mortals to the true meaning of life. It tears apart the veil of the falsehood of this tawdry reality. The teachings of the Silent Holder expand the limitations of the mind, molding their consciousness to reach their true and limitless wisdom. The living must shatter the limiting concept of perception and discard the shackles of sanity. This is just the first step in a greater and more beautiful existence.

The Xind Observer is a new demon, found prowling the tower of Xinderoth and surrounding areas. What this new beast is doing here is unknown at this time but they seem to be looking for something. Or someone. Is the madness of Xinderoth over, or is there more happening in the shadows than we know?

Slobnoth Ogrekin is a huge, slobbering, bullheaded, brawling beast! A supremely powerful fighter, he lives up to his Ogrekin title, by fighting everything he comes across and eating it. Like most Ogres, he's not stupid, just simple and violent. Not a good combination.

Professor Morbidstein is a twisted genius who has pushed the boundaries of theoretical necromantic magics to its very limits. His appetite for knowledge knows apparently no limits and is constantly on the look out for new subjects upon whom to practice his vile experiments.
Xinderoth, tyrant, deceiver of Demons, destroyer of cities. Ageless and powerful. He is not to be taken lightly.

Mourarchian is an aquatic being that has taken the shape of a strange, finned horse. It is unknown if it is able to take on other forms but what IS known is that this is a cruel and aggressive being. It will lurk in shallow waters and launch surprise attacks against any living being that comes too close. It will try to drag its prey into the waters it stays in to drown them. If successful, it devours its prey, ignoring only the liver, which floats to the surface as warning to any other beings nearby!

This fellow walked into a pub one night and proceeded to drink brew after brew not realizing the Dreadlord's minions had the bartender under their control and had him spiking his drinks with a magical elixir. This elixir put the poor fellow into a permanently drunk state. He now walks the Realms with his Keg, trying to hand out his own mugs to unsuspecting beer lovers...Designed by : leos3000

Nahuatl the Gigantic was once a happy little armadillo that has been corrupted by the evil magic of the Shadow Lord. This caused it to grow to gargantuan sizes gave it a thirst for the blood of any Adventurers who dare cross its path. Now it rampages throughout the realms digging holes and waiting for it's next victim to come too close so it can burst out and attack. With a thick armored hide even the strongest of Adventurers may have trouble defeating this monster!Designed by : Necropen

During the battle of Erila, Emperor Sidd led a small army of skilled warriors from Galgadreen but he betrayed his ally, Old King Gadraen, to join the Shadow Lord due to his roguish desire for power. According to myths, the secret behind Emperor Sidd's combat skills lie in the enchanted gear passed down from his ancestors. Unfortunately he is never seen without so it must be pried off his dead body.Designed by : siddy246

The Boom Hawk is a gigantic bird of prey. Long of claw and powerful of wing, it's greatest weapon is actually it's shriek! Using it's immense voice box, it shrieks out a hugely powerful sonic sound that can disorientate and ultimately destroy it's prey. The only creatures that can withstand the sound is another Boom Hawk!Designed by : smileynirv

spawningInfo.realmName: Floating Islands of Wu Kong (North Island)

description: Drogorath’s age is unknown, but his hatred of elven-kind is known throughout the realms.  As an adolescent, Drogorath would spend his days getting bullied and tricked by the local Elves and he was unable to defend himself (being small and pitiful).  As he aged, his hatred for Elves grew along side his size and strength.Whenever Drogorath would hear word of Elves terrorizing the lands, he’d equip his Corrupted Mithril Armor and his Elf-Crushing Gauntlets and obliterate the rogues.  It is said that the screams of the annihilated elves is what powers his Armor and Gauntlets.Designed by : iceman66

Gunnolf the Corrupted was once friend to the Realms Warriors and Adventurers. Unfortunately for all, he was grievously wounded and bound down. The minions of the Shadow Lord poured all their hate and malice into the noble creature and Gunnolf arose, purple energies of the Shroud pouring from him. He destroyed his corruptors, much to the amusement of the Shadow Lord, then howled his agony and fury to the skies. Since that night, Gunnolf has been stalking the lands, hunting those he used to aid, his massive, armoured body turning the stoutest of weapons aside!Designed by : TERRORDOG

Empress Tinny is the beloved wife of Emperor Sidd. When Emperor Sidd departed on his quest of conquest, he left his beloved in charge as he knew she hated violence and weaponry though she understands their need. She has waited and ruled in Sidd's stead though she has slowly been drawn into the service of the Shadowlord due to her husbands corruption! Designed by : siddy246

Once an honest scholar of the magical arts. Long ago he sought to grow stronger and rise to greater power. He pleaded with the Shadow Lord to grant him this power. The Shadow Lord agreed to do so but in return asked that his new creation harvest souls of the innocent in his name. The deal was struck and since that day The Soul Thief has been roaming the realms extracting and defiling the souls of any who cross his path and using them to enhance his own power.Designed by : Josh1404

Grooango the Trickster loves to have fun, play tricks and generally get up to mischief. Her heart is in the right place, however she has a very hard time knowing right from wrong, leading to damage,injuries or worse. She needs to be brought under control!  Designed by : Groosalugg

Rion was feisty as a boy. He was very particular about what calmed him down, and the only thing that seemed to work was a rattle. This infatuation with a rattle grew with him and he eventually became obsessed with rattlesnakes. He now trains the snakes to do his bidding. Slithering around realms to steal gold and armor. As he masters his craft of thievery, he has realised the best place to catch warriors off guard is in the dark. The poor souls never see the snakes coming, but if you carry your own rattle you may just distract them enough to escape.Designed by : leos3000

A shade of the great cosmic spider, Rosmeriat. Tired of her life in the Web of Chaos, the gargantuan cosmic spider - Rosmeriat - left the void to lay claim to the lands of Erildath. Her children follow her like soldiers to a queen, laying waste to all that is living, and paving the foundations for her new world-shattering empire.

A specter of the great cosmic spider, Rosmeriat. Tired of her life in the Web of Chaos, the gargantuan cosmic spider - Rosmeriat - left the void to lay claim to the lands of Erildath. Her children follow her like soldiers to a queen, laying waste to all that is living, and paving the foundations for her new world-shattering empire.

A shroud of the great cosmic spider, Rosmeriat. Tired of her life in the Web of Chaos, the gargantuan cosmic spider - Rosmeriat - left the void to lay claim to the lands of Erildath. Her children follow her like soldiers to a queen, laying waste to all that is living, and paving the foundations for her new world-shattering empire.

A shadow of the great cosmic spider, Rosmeriat. Tired of her life in the Web of Chaos, the gargantuan cosmic spider - Rosmeriat - left the void to lay claim to the lands of Erildath. Her children follow her like soldiers to a queen, laying waste to all that is living, and paving the foundations for her new world-shattering empire.

A spirit of the great cosmic spider, Rosmeriat.Tired of her life in the Web of Chaos, the gargantuan cosmic spider - Rosmeriat - left the void to lay claim to the lands of Erildath. Her children follow her like soldiers to a queen, laying waste to all that is living, and paving the foundations for her new world-shattering empire.

Tired of her life in the Web of Chaos, the gargantuan cosmic spider - Rosmeriat - left the void to lay claim to the lands of Erildath. Her children follow her like soldiers to a queen, laying waste to all that is living, and paving the foundations for her new world-shattering empire.Her eldest daughter, Aranevva, leads the vanguard against the people of Erildath. In her mother’s name, she will rend the land and trap kingdoms in her chaotic weave.

The Shadow Chancellor. A vile creature. Where it came from, no one knows. All they did know is it handed out tokens and has had the King's ear ever since it arrived and convinced him of it's usefulness. As a mouth piece of the Shadow Lord, it must be destroyed, for the good of all!

The Undead King ruled his realm in the distant past. A place not noted in any history books or even the most ancient of crumbling maps. The King shambles from realm to realm, trying to find his home, only remembering the dimmest of memories himself. Not realizing his undead nature, he wonders why people scream and run from him or attack him when he reaches out to them, calling in what he thinks is a clear voice but instead is issued forth from rotten vocal cords. No matter! He continues to search for his home. A lonesome figure but one who is terrifyingly strong and hard to destroy!Designed by: Vaelian

Ribica is a slimy, sleepy cave dragon. In appearance, he's rather like a salamander. This beast had locals living in fear as it would regularly devour their livestock and occasionally people. He was driven from his original home by a courageous boy who constructed a bomb that was hidden in the carcass of a cow. Ribica, being lazy and hungry, devoured the cow and the bomb exploded, grievously wounding the dragon. It fled, leaving parts of its body behind. It has since regenerated the damage but the people created a bag from the skin for the boy, as well as a set of boots. Designed by: QuaBules

The enlightened monkey king wanders the world and blesses all that encounter him on his journeys with good fortune and favor. The king has reformed many of his mischievous habits from his youth, but evildoers beware; he has a penchant for mischief and will not hesitate to punish those who provoke him! He is also known for challenging warriors to feats of strength and rewarding those who best him!Designed by: fugrnugget

The Wandering Ronin stalks the realms, hunting those whom he deems evil. Unfortunately, his mind is addled by dark forces and those he strikes down are almost all innocent bystanders, cut down for no fault of their own!Designed by: HiddnNinja

Ivanidas appears rough and intimidating, with a muscular build and a permanent scowl etched onto his features. But beneath that tough exterior lies a heart of gold, full of compassion and empathy for those who have been wronged.Ivanidas is a controversial figure in his community, and many view him as a dangerous outlaw. But he sees himself as a necessary force for good, a defender of the innocent against the corrupt and powerful.Despite his intentions, Ivanidas is often misunderstood by those around him. He is driven by a deep sense of justice and a burning desire to make a difference in the world.Ivanidas wears magical gloves that come from the gods he prays to, don't be fooled as they pack a punch, he also wears golden sandals to not only show his royalty but to show his elegance.Designed by: Ivanidas

Once upon a time there was a magical creature of good. The Golden Fish fulfilled the wishes of the poor and spread good fortune. Alas, a villainous sorcerer managed to contain it and, with a system of spells, put it in his control. As often happens, his foolish wishes turned immediately against him, becoming the first victim of Tempest Peysk. The damage was done, and this once-good creature became a nightmare to all! There is hope, however, for with every scale Tempest Peysk loses, the gruesome spell fades, hopefully eventually bringing about the rebirth of the Golden Fish.Designed by: stormfish

Vendreya is a fallen angel. Powerful, with an innate connection to nature, she manipulated seasonal growth and death in battle. After censure for her actions, she fell from grace and was made an outcast. Wandering the realms she came upon a harsh forest. The inhabitants proved to be fierce and territorial and, seeing her as a threat overpowered her. Broken down by their onslaught she conceded them to be the victors. The Guardians of this forest were stunned by her raw power and the way their own forest domain reacted to her. Instead of destroying her, they decided to help her instead. As their relationship grew, the fallen regained power through the faith of these Guardians. With her power growing she wanders the realms again destroying all who would harm nature, no matter the reason! Created by: rockitman5

King KyMan ruled his empire through the use of a peculiar javelin, which would amplify his words while setting them to music. The resulting enchantment was lasting obedience and fealty. Though a gifted warrior, King KyMan's Empire grew through the power of his enchanted voice and few would stand in his path. Those few who did were, at best, minor impediments until, at last, one opponent's own magics broke KyMan's defences, sending him into a deep sorcerous sleep lasting aeons. His story should have ended there, buried under the sands. However, as ever happens, resourceful tomb raiders found the complex KyMan was interred within and broke the enchantment. Now, KyMan is once again abroad in the world, attempting to rebuild his Empire in an age of heroes.Designed by: kymani16

Sofia's mother a wicked witch who created her with dark magic to destroy her enemies failed in the making of her experimental child. Furious that the child turned out to be benevolent, she cursed her beloved pet giraffe turning it into a horrible magical beast. The giraffe only known as 'Sofia's Curse" rampages throughout villages killing, and destroying anything that's in its way. As part of the curse, Sofia will forever be bonded to her cursed pet until the curse is lifted. As for the giraffe's appetite for terror, and destruction, it's only just beginning!Created: Blenny

The Murkwood Guardians are a tribe of superior elves, fiercely dedicated to protecting their home and its inhabitants. Deep in the heart of Murkwood, they found a massive spider, larger than any they had ever seen. With their superior combat skills and magic, the Murkwood Guardians overkilled the spider, sending a clear message to any potential threats. They were not to be trifled with. 

As time passed, the Murkwood Guardians remained vigilant, watching over their home and their people with unwavering dedication. They stood ready to face any challenge that may come their way, their overkill of the massive spider serving as a reminder of their strength and prowess in battle. They had become a symbol of hope and protection, a shining example of what it means to be a true guardian of the forest.

Design by: EpicPiety

Noura is a woman who knows the power of her feminine charms. She is a seductress, using her beauty and sensuality to her advantage. Nora is also profoundly connected to her cultural roots and takes great pride in her heritage. She is a skilled dancer and musician, her art a reflection of her sensuality and passions. She uses all her gifts to charm her way into the inner circle of the rich and powerful, claiming their valuables and, more often than not, their military forces, which she throws against her foes.

Design by: MadFrenzy

The Gods alone know what the Unstable Matter used to be. It seems to shift between forms and even matter states. One moment the entity is writhing flesh which suddenly flows into water, shifting to colourful and weirdly cohesive gas before flesh again. The creature does have a humanoid shape, which is the only clue to its original form.

Designed by: zizzwyly

The Panibuamelu are guardian creatures of a long-forgotten demigod. A nightmarish fusion of human and scorpion, this cunning and intelligent monster is a formidable warrior wielding 2 blade, its scorpion claws and tail while naturally armored in terribly strong chitin. 

Designed by: LastRogue

Testudines Gigantus is a colossal tortoise. He's a placid creature, wandering along, devouring farmland crops. He is incredibly difficult to harm, with a shell that is feet thick. Hard to damage, it might be better to try and drive such a creature to new areas, when he does less damage!

Designed by: savipats

Whit was a master thief, renowned for his daring heists and elusive nature, until a botched robbery in a forbidden temple unleashed a vengeful curse, binding his soul to the darkness and transforming him into a demon condemned to haunt the shadows, forever tormented by the echoes of his past sins.

Designed by: Whitlol

Princess Elena is a codename for a rogue agent belonging to a secret shadow organization. Intel suggests she carries out assassinations on behalf of an individual named as Blenny. Very little is known of the two, but what is known is that Princess Elena wields magical items. It's said her weapon itself obliterates her foes in seconds. Eyewitnesses also mentioned that her necklace glows right before an attack, and that her victims seemed hypnotized before the final blow.

Designed by: Blenny

A star had fallen and Astraalyn, a revered warrior, was chosen to lead an expedition to investigate. It was suspected a group of mages orchestrated this celestial event, and Astraalyn was determined to uncover the truth. Her group was ambushed and through the carnage, shards of the star's core called to her and she picked them up. She felt a strange warmth in her hand, followed by a shivering feeling. The trance broke, and she became aware of the silence. While distracted, all of her companions had fallen. 

Astraalyn created a blade imbued with the star's shards, but its creation awakened an ancient, malevolent spirit hidden within the remnants and everyone who possessed magical abilities became an enemy in her eyes, condemned by her newly twisted sense of justice.

Designed by: MadFrenzy

In the mystical forests of Elondria, a monstrous goblin dog named Barghest roamed only at night, its glowing eyes striking fear into all who heard its howls. One night, a brave orphan named Elara crossed paths with Barghest. Instead of fear, she showed compassion, seeing the creature's pain. With a touch, she tamed the beast, and they became unlikely companions. Together, they protected the forest, a symbol of the power of friendship and bravery in the face of darkness.

Designed by: slayer5678
